trans-unit.source: Indicates change options when <see cref="M:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges" /> is called.
When the ContinueOnError option is set, subsequent operations are still tried even after an error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 當設定 ContinueOnError 選項時，後續作業仍將嘗試即使發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: When batching is not used, the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse.BatchHeaders%2A> property on the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse.BatchHeaders%2A> instance returns an empty collection and the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse.BatchStatusCode%2A> property is zero.
trans-unit.target: 未使用批次處理時，<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse.BatchHeaders%2A> 執行個體上的 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse.BatchHeaders%2A> 屬性會傳為空集合，而且 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse.BatchStatusCode%2A> 屬性為零。

trans-unit.source: You cannot set both Batch and ContinueOnError at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 您無法同時設定批次和 ContinueOnError。

trans-unit.source: All pending changes are saved in a single batch request.
Pending changes are saved by using multiple requests to the server, and the operation continues after an error occurs.
Pending changes are saved by using multiple requests to the server, but the operation stops on the first failure (default).

Pending updates are made by replacing all values of the entity in the data source with values from the updated entity (HTTP PUT) instead of just updating changed values (HTTP MERGE), which is the default behavior.
